content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent and I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you.

What kind of apartment are you looking for and how long do you plan to stay in Munich? This information will help me determine the best rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment, preferably with a balcony. I plan to stay in Munich for 6 months.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for the information, Maria. Based on your requirements, I would like to propose a rental price of €800 per month. This price includes the cost of utilities and other expenses.

I believe this is a fair and reasonable rental price for a 25 square meter apartment with a balcony in Munich. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or any additional information you would like to provide before we agree on a rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think that is a fair price, I agree to the price of €800 per month. Thank you for your help, I will take the apartment.

Also, I would like to ask if there is any possibility to negotiate the rental price in the future if my financial situation changes.

I would also like to ask if it is possible to pay a deposit and have a written agreement before moving in.

Thank you again for your help.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your decision, Maria. I am glad you found the rental price acceptable.

Regarding your request for the possibility of negotiating the rental price in the future if your financial situation changes, I am willing to consider this on a case-by-case basis. However, it is important to note that any changes to the rental price will depend on market conditions and my own financial situation at the time.

As for your request for a deposit and a written agreement before moving in, I can certainly provide you with a written agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the rental agreement. Additionally, I am willing to accept a deposit to cover any potential damages or unpaid rent.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. I am happy to assist you in any way I can.
name: Heinrich Heine
